name: Neon Buster
description:
Neon Buster is a block breaking game created using the Godot Engine.  This was a small project to help me get used to Godot.  At the moment there are only three levels, and I'm not likely to develop more.  The source code is available on GitHub for anyone to use as reference, or to extend it into a full game.

How to Play

Use the left and right arrow keys or A and D to move the paddle.

The spacebar will launch the ball from the paddle.

There are four powerups in  the game:

  1. Extra Life
  2. Fastball
  3. Sticky Paddle
  4. Triple Ball
